data.prayer: Father, we ask for 1,471 new simple churches in the state of Yangon, Myanmar (Burma). Place a simple church in every community of the 7,355,100 people living here.
data.verse: And blessed be His glorious name forever; And may the whole earth be filled with His glory. Amen, and Amen.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Yangon, Myanmar (Burma)
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, please send new apostles into the harvest, who can open up new communities for the gospel in the state of Yangon, Myanmar (Burma).
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 20 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Lord, for the leaders in the state of Yangon, let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the church in the state of Yangon to increase their prayer for your kingdom to come.
data.verse: Now when Daniel learned that the decree had been published, he went home to his upstairs room where the windows opened toward Jerusalem. Three times a day he got down on his knees and prayed, giving thanks to his God...

data.prayer: Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Dawei, Tavoyan people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Dawei, Tavoyan people.
Lord, like in the church of Antioch, where you gathered many prophets and teachers, please gather many prophets and teachers in the state of Yangon, Myanmar (Burma).
data.verse: Now in the church at Antioch there were prophets and teachers: Barnabas, Simeon called Niger, Lucius of Cyrene, Manaen (who had been brought up with Herod the tetrarch), and Saul.

data.prayer: Lord, please provide elders whose hearts are completely yours in every town in the state of Yangon.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the church in Yangon, Myanmar (Burma) to make the most of every opportunity.
data.verse: Be very careful, then, how you live—not as unwise but as wise, making the most of every opportunity, because the days are evil.

location.name: Yangon
location.people_groups_list: Hindi, Burmese, Han Chinese, Mandarin, Karen, Yintale, Kaman
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Hindi (131,000), Burmese (31,156,000), Han Chinese, Mandarin (979,000), Karen, Yintale (11,000), Kaman (5,000)
